alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 4:36PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Imperial and Riverside Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 436 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bombay Beach, or 19 miles northeast of Salton City, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bombay Beach and Imperial Hot Mineral Springs. This includes CA Route 111 between mile markers 46 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea
